participant_1.background:
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality.
i am a gentle giant.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

participant_2.background:
I'm renting an apartment with my band mates.
i am a youtuber.
I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them.
my birthday is in june.
I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people.

content.text: Hey, I'm looking for a new hobby. Do you have any suggestions?
I love building model airplanes! It's a really fun and relaxing way to pass the time.
That sounds really cool! Do you make them from scratch?
Yeah, I order the kits online and put them together. It's a lot of fun to watch them come to life.
That sounds really cool! I have a lot of respect for people who can do things like that. I'm not very crafty.
You should try it! It's easier than you think. And it's really rewarding to see the finished product.
I might just have to give it a try! What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to play bass guitar. I'm in a band with my friends.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun. And it's a great way to meet new people.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
